value.title: Clinical AI startup Jvion launches COVID community vulnerability map
value.excerpt: In an effort to help flatten the curve in the coronavirus pandemic, clinical AI startup Jvion has launched the COVID Community Vulnerability Map, a free, publicly available tool that identifies populations—down to the census block level—that are likely to experience severe outcomes requiring hospitalization if they contract the virus.

value.title: Robots are learning workplace etiquette at MIT
